Jugl. Class

Contains functions for Jugl style class creation and inheritance.

Summary
Jugl. Class
Contains functions for Jugl style class creation and inheritance.
Properties
isPrototype
Private.  Anonymous function used as a test during object instantiation and to allow for inheritance.
Functions
create
Called to create a new Jugl class.
inherit
Allow for inheritance from one or more classes.
